p: Figure 8 : Three sub-volumes extracted from the three mini-samples. ( a) This panel shows the sub-volume extracted from mini-sample 1 (weakly water-wet). ( b) This panel shows the sub-volume extracted from mini-sample 2 (mixed-wet). ( c) This panel shows the sub-volume extracted from mini-sample 3 (mixed-wet) . Please click here to view a larger version of this figure.
